summary: I can be your follower not really but if you download this mod i can
descriptionHtml:
Hello.My Name Is Norphixon The Creator Of Norphixon The Follower I wan't to thank you for the people who download this mod.

Norphixon Is Me In My game as your follower In Yours but im not actually there.

Im not going to explain the back story of Norphixon. Because he doesn't have one just yet i will probably give him some back story but for know just a few options in his dialogue.

A Special thanks to 
Omesean for the armour And 
InsanitySorrow For The Katana

Please go check out there mods and endorse there mods if you Download Them.

And Thank You People That Download This
author: Norphixon
